name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Principal Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building high-performance, scalable applications. Proficient in **Go**, **TypeScript**, and **Node.js**, with a solid understanding of **PostgreSQL** and **Redis** for data management. Well-versed in algorithms, data structures, and performance optimization, ensuring clean and maintainable code.

Demonstrated expertise in delivering robust backend solutions and implementing event-driven architectures and microservices. Experienced in adhering to industry standards, with a focus on compliance-driven development. Strong background in high-performance applications across healthcare and financial sectors, leveraging advanced frameworks and tools such as **React**, **Django**, and **FastAPI**. Proven ability to drive innovation through AI/ML technologies and cloud-native deployments on **AWS** and **Azure**.
